Jx.Adaptor.Tree

This base class is used to change a store (a flat list of records) into the data structure needed for a Jx.Tree.  It will have 2 subclasses: <Jx.Adapter.Tree.Mptt> and Jx.Adapter.Tree.Parent.

Copyright 2010 by Jonathan Bomgardner License: mit-style

Summary
Jx.Adaptor.TreeThis base class is used to change a store (a flat list of records) into the data structure needed for a Jx.Tree.
Options
monitorFoldersDetermines if this adapter should use monitor the TreeFolder items in order to request any items they should contain if they are empty.
startingNodeKeyThe store primary key to use as the node that we’re requesting.
folderOptionsA Hash containing the options for <Jx.TreeFolder>.
itemOptionsA Hash containing the options for <Jx.TreeItem>.
Functions
attachAttaches this adaptor to a specific tree instance.
detachremoves this adaptor from the current tree.
firstLoadMethod used to start the first store load.
fillThis function will start at this.currentRecord and add the remaining items to the tree.

Options

monitorFolders

Determines if this adapter should use monitor the TreeFolder items in order to request any items they should contain if they are empty.

startingNodeKey

The store primary key to use as the node that we’re requesting.  Initially set to -1 to indicate that we’re request the first set of data

folderOptions

A Hash containing the options for <Jx.TreeFolder>.  Defaults to null.

itemOptions

A Hash containing the options for <Jx.TreeItem>.  Defaults to null.

Functions

attach

attach: function (tree)

Attaches this adaptor to a specific tree instance.

Parameters

treean instance of Jx.Tree

detach

detach: function ()

removes this adaptor from the current tree.

firstLoad

firstLoad: function ()

Method used to start the first store load.

fill

fill: function ()

This function will start at this.currentRecord and add the remaining items to the tree.

attach: function (tree)
Attaches this adaptor to a specific tree instance.
detach: function ()
removes this adaptor from the current tree.
firstLoad: function ()
Method used to start the first store load.
fill: function ()
This function will start at this.currentRecord and add the remaining items to the tree.
This class adapts a table adhering to the classic Parent-style “tree table”.
Jx.Tree displays hierarchical data in a tree structure of folders and nodes.
